title: Expert Course on Online Language Lecture Design and Operation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and language learning experience
context.additional_context: Combines self-directed learning using digital devices (tablets/laptops) with weekly offline workshops, featuring project-based learning where learners design actual language education content

learning_goals: Learners can execute online language course design processes according to ADDIE model phases
It can implement content chunking and interactive elements tailored to learner characteristics
It can revise lecture designs by incorporating peer and instructor feedback through project-based assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
